channel.title: founderinstitute on Ramon Suarez's curiosity lead learning life

item.title: Interview about the Founder Institute in Tech Brew Podcast [Audio]
FI: Pitch Bootcamp in Brussels with Filip Tack
item.description: This is my first event as director of the Founder Insitute in Brussels. I’m really looking forward to it. Filip is amazing and I’m sure that the ideas that people will pitch are also gonna be fantastic (and a great way to prepare for Startup Weekend Brussels!)

item.title: Qu’est-ce que c’est le Founder Institute? Explication de Alain Baritault [Video]
item.description: Alain Baritault est un des collègues qui organisent le Founder Institute en Europe. Depuis Paris, il nous explique en quelques mots qu’est-ce que c’est le Founder Institute:

item.title: Founder Institute Grads: 77% Progressing Faster than Planned
item.description: He included this four charts with stats about the Founder Institute’s participants that are quite interesting. Allmost all participants are over 25 years old 77% of the graduated companies are progressing ahead of their plan This last point stresses what I like the most about the Founder Institute: it is about doing. There’s no better place to help you transform your idea into a company in just 4 months.

item.title: Why join the Founder Institute Brussels? [Video]
item.description: Do you have what it takes to become an entrepreneur? Prove it.
